Name: HAXWARE COMGAM
About the game: COMGAM is a free Trading Card Game that you can play that takes place in the HAXWARE universe. Collect HAXWARE Warriors, & configure a team of 5 Warrior Cards, & take them online to battle other players around the world to prove that your configured team is the best. COMGAM is an autobattler TCG, but you have agency in the team that you configure, & how you configure their AI & the accessory cards that you equip to them. JOIN DISCORD:
